item.title: Greta Thunberg: Scotland not a world leader on climate change
item.description: Speaking ahead of Glasgow's COP26, the activist says no country in the "global north" is doing enough.

item.title: Record 400,000 waiting to see NHS specialists
item.description: Despite an increase in NHS activity in Scotland, a record number are still waiting to see a specialist.

item.title: COP26: Riot training for thousands of police ahead of summit
item.description: About 10,000 officers a day will police the climate summit in Glasgow, one of the biggest-ever UK operations.

item.title: Glasgow 'fix room' campaigner went back to drugs after 11 years
item.description: Peter Krykant, who operated a drugs consumption van in Glasgow, says he found it hard to get help in Scotland.

item.title: Covid in Scotland: Cases doubling weekly after restrictions eased
item.description: More than 500 people who have tested positive for the virus are in hospital in Scotland.

item.title: Women assaulted and dogs taken in 'targeted theft'
item.description: Police say they believe the breed of the dogs, described as pit bulls, were specifically targeted by two men.

item.title: Man aged 81 dies after Orkney road crash
item.description: Patrick Allan, from Kirkwall, was a passenger in one of two cars involved in the collision in Orkney.

item.title: Rankin 'honoured' to complete McIlvanney novel
item.description: Ian Rankin finished a draft manuscript written by the acclaimed crime writer William McIlvanney who died in 2015.

item.title: Repairs begin on fire-hit building in Edinburgh's Old Town
item.description: The six-storey building in the Old Town is being fitted with structures to hold it up so it is safe for workmen.

item.title: Scottish Green co-leaders given ministerial roles
item.description: Patrick Harvie and Lorna Slater will take up junior ministerial positions as part of the SNP-Green deal.

item.title: US Open 2021: Andy Murray loses to Stefanos Tsitsipas, Dan Evans through, Heather Watson & Harriet Dart out
item.description: Andy Murray produces his finest display in four injury-disrupted years but falls short of beating Stefanos Tsitsipas at the US Open.

item.title: Covid in Scotland: Where are the latest cases?

item.title: Covid in Scotland: Is the drive to get young people jabbed working?

item.title: Covid jab response low for some immunosuppressed people

item.title: Covid in Scotland: What are the rules?
item.description: Scotland's levels system of restrictions have come to an end - but what does that mean people can do?

item.title: Covid: Is Scotland lagging behind on vaccine certificates?
item.description: A digital "passport" has been rolled out across the EU - so why does Scotland use a paper system?

item.title: Covid in Scotland: Your questions answered on life after level zero
item.description: Readers have been sending in their questions about what the ending of more Covid rules means for them.

item.title: Covid in Scotland: Are young people slowing the vaccine drive?

item.title: Covid map: Coronavirus cases, deaths, vaccinations by country
item.description: Key maps and charts explaining how the virus has spread around the world.

item.title: Covid in Scotland: When do school pupils have to self-isolate?

item.title: Patrick Harvie and Lorna Slater: Who are the new Green ministers?

item.title: Paramotor pilot shares pictures of John O'Groats-Land's End flight

item.title: How Scotland's City of Culture bids stack up
item.description: The case being made for three very different parts of the country to secure the status for 2025.

item.title: The deal is done - so what lies ahead?
item.description: BBC Scotland's political editor Glenn Campbell on the historic agreement that will take the Greens into government

item.title: Greta Thunberg: 'I'll go to COP26 if it's safe and democratic'

item.title: Fire crews tackle Nick Nairn restaurant blaze

item.title: The tiny island school that needs a new teacher

item.title: Footage shows fire damage to Edinburgh 'Harry Potter' cafe

item.title: Tokyo Paralympics: Aileen McGlynn and Helen Scott win silver in 1000m time trial

item.title: US Open 2021: Andy Murray 'lost respect' for Stefanos Tsitsipas after bathroom row

item.title: Scotland: How Steve Clarke's side can evolve for World Cup tilt

item.title: AB Zondagh: Scotland sign up South African attack coach
